statements: UPDATE solo_travel_trends SET traveler_name='Alice', destination='Paris' WHERE travel_id=1;
UPDATE solo_travel_trends SET travel_purpose='Business', travel_date='2023-09-15' WHERE travel_id=2;
UPDATE solo_travel_trends SET traveler_name='Alice', destination='Paris' WHERE travel_id=1001
UPDATE solo_travel_trends SET travel_date='2022-10-15', travel_purpose='Leisure' WHERE traveler_name='Bob'
UPDATE solo_travelers SET age = 30 WHERE traveler_id = 1;
UPDATE travel_logs SET destination = 'New York City', duration_days = 5 WHERE traveler_id = 2;
UPDATE solo_travelers SET age = 30, country_of_origin = 'France' WHERE traveler_id = 1;
UPDATE travel_logs SET duration_days = 7, travel_purpose = 'Vacation' WHERE traveler_id = 2 AND destination = 'Italy';
UPDATE solo_travelers SET traveler_name = 'John Doe', destination = 'Paris' WHERE traveler_id = 1;
UPDATE travel_activities SET activity_name = 'Sightseeing Tour', activity_type = 'Tour', activity_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE traveler_id = 1;
UPDATE solo_travelers SET age = 30, country_of_origin = 'Canada' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE solo_trips SET cost = 1500.50, duration_days = 7 WHERE trip_id = 3;
UPDATE solo_travelers SET country_of_origin = 'France' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE solo_trips SET cost = 1500.50, duration_days = 7 WHERE trip_id = 3;
UPDATE SoloTravelers SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE traveler_id = 1;
UPDATE TravelDestinations SET average_rating = 4.5, region = 'Europe', popular_activities = 'Skiing, Hiking' WHERE destination_id = 3;
UPDATE SoloTravelers SET age = 30, country_of_origin = 'Spain' WHERE traveler_name = 'John Smith';

UPDATE TravelExpenses SET transportation_cost = 200.50, total_cost = accommodation_cost + transportation_cost + food_cost WHERE history_id IN (SELECT history_id FROM TravelHistory WHERE total_duration > 5);
